DOC.criteria: Histological and/or cytological confirmation metastatic breast cancer refractory anthracycline , taxane , without capecitabine therapy ; WHO performance status 0 , 1 2 day registration ; Females , age > = 18 year ; No Gastrointestinal pathology could affect bioavailability ZD6474 .
